description:
Speaker: Eric Holscher

This tutorial will cover how to write documentation using RST, Sphinx, and publish it on Read the Docs. It will walk users through the experience of taking a basic module, writing multiple pages of documentation for it, and then publishing it for the world to see. We'll learn about the mental model required to write documentation, specifically ho

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
title: Documenting your project with Sphinx & Read the Docs
